entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending near midnight then partly cloudy. A few thunderstorms early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 later this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
